Non-Aligned Movement leaders denounce Israel's military campaign in GazaLeaders of Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) countries on Friday denounced Israel's military campaign in Gaza and demanded an immediate ceasefire there, during the annual summit of the 120-member bloc. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:09:35 GMT EGEOE4GDZJJWHC7S2DGMMLWBZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/non-aligned-movement-leaders-denounce-israeli-military-campaign-in-gaza-2024-01-19/Elias Biryabarema世界
France could face nationwide farmer protests as anger mountsFrance's largest farm union FNSEA is considering nationwide protests in the coming weeks, a spokesperson said on Friday, potentially expanding action by farmers in the southwest who have blocked a highway and dumped manure on public buildings. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:04:58 GMT D6KC5I3H4BPSBHWEPHUI4OD37Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-could-face-nationwide-farmer-protests-mounts-anger-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian prosecutor asks court to jail woman accused of killing war blogger for 28 years - RIAA Russian state prosecutor on Friday asked a court to jail Darya Trepova, a woman accused of killing a prominent military blogger by blowing him up at Ukraine's behest, to 28 years in jail, the RIA news agency reported. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 12:52:52 GMT VNOSOM6ANFNPTJ4OHKHNOFEIOM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-prosecutor-asks-court-jail-woman-accused-of-killing-war-blogger-28-years-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Dutch parliament considers first step towards asking king to pay income taxDutch lawmakers will vote on Tuesday on a first step towards requiring King Willem-Alexander and his family to pay income tax, a plan that would require an amendment to the constitution. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 12:44:08 GMT ZX63TXRUOBOK3FZLQK4TSNI4BY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-parliament-considers-first-step-towards-asking-king-pay-venue-tax-2024-01-19/Charlotte Van Campenhout世界欧洲
Yemen's Houthis say they do not seek to expand Red Sea attacksYemen's Houthis have said they did not intend to expand their attacks on shipping in and around the Red Sea further, beyond their stated aims of blockading Israel and retaliating against the United States and Britain for air strikes. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 12:36:52 GMT HYCQ4LVUDVPLZPI3UIFH2J35SY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-say-they-do-not-seek-to-expand-red-sea-attacks-2024-01-19/Samia Nakhoul世界中东地区
Man killed by explosion at Dublin homeless shelterAn army bomb disposal team carried out a controlled explosion at a Dublin homeless hostel on Thursday after a man was killed in a blast that destroyed his room but left other residents uninjured. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 12:04:11 GMT YUWQICRDUFNJTJVYU6ZCJWG5HM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/man-killed-by-explosion-at-dublin-homeless-shelter-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Asylum seekers 'missing' after crossing Russia border to FinlandSome 160 people who applied for asylum at Finland's eastern border last year have since disappeared, amid a sudden surge of asylum seekers arriving via Russia, Finland's immigration authority said. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:57:15 GMT P22JZQW2KRJVDBAFDDSR23UANM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/asylum-seekers-missing-after-crossing- Russian-border-finland-2024-01-19/Greta Fondahn世界欧洲
Gaza: Israeli tanks push towards biggest hospital still workingPeople inside Khan Younis' Nasser Hospital, forced to house displaced Gazans as well as patients, reported hearing shellfire from tanks advancing into the west of the city. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:49:53 GMT YS4PFBY7LJO7ZFSFBMJQGBYYZE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tanks-renew-push-towards-biggest-hospital-still-working-in-gaza-2024-01-19/Reuters世界中东地区
Magnitude 5.7 earthquake strikes Colombia region -EMSCA magnitude 5.7 earthquake struck the Colombia region on Friday, the European Mediterranean Seismological Centre said. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:38:10 GMT 43ZVGTAH7NOONDRT5722UF3XJI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/magnitude-57-earthquake-strikes-colombia-region-emsc-2024-01-19/Reuters世界美洲
UN rights official says Gaza detainees humiliated, dressed in diapersA U.N. human rights official accused Israel on Friday of mistreating Palestinian detainees in Gaza, saying he had met men who had described being held for weeks, beaten and blindfolded, with some released in diapers. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:28:14 GMT 4Y7CQ3UECRIIBJJIDAE2GMEBZY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-rights-official-says-gaza-detainees-humiliated-dressed-diapers-2024-01-19/Reuters世界中东地区
Cuban soup kitchen sees soaring demand as economic crisis deepensCuban Elda William, a 60-year old former psychologist, had been making ends meet selling cellphone plans - until a sewage pipe at her home office burst, putting off prospective clients. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:12:04 GMT 6TO4SN6ISZKWZNRCILGODWVPNA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuban-soup-kitchen-sees-soaring-demand-economic-crisis-deepens-2024-01-19/Alien Fernandez, Dave Sherwood世界美洲
